availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky native.Married to Ruth W. Kelly. Father of Thomas C. Kelly Jr. , William S. Kelly, James Y. Kelly. Clerk in Scott County in 1850. Lawyer in Scott County in 1863. Bank Cashier in Scott county in 1880.

ab.bibl:
Find A Grave, "James Y. Kelly (May 11, 1831-May 09, 1929)," Memorial #102004332, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/102004332 (accessed September 6, 2018).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 396B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Georgetown, 37A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records_ (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Scott County, KY, July 1863, No. 16, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
